articles.title: Florentino Perez has one final historical challenge left with Real Madrid - Madrid Universal
articles.description: Real Madrid sealed their 36th La Liga title during the weekend after a convincing win over Cadiz at the Santiago Bernabeu. The celebrations, however, have been subdued given the UCL game coming midweek. Irrespective of what happens against Bayer Munich, it is…
articles.content:
In a major development, journalist Jorge C Picon (h/t RM4Arab) reports that Argentine sensation Franco Mastantuono wants to play for Real Madrid.
